reviewText: Great concert, however DVD format is such that it will not play on any of my DVD players but will play in a very limited way on my computer.

This DVD of the Flower Kings tour was recorded in 2007 after the release of one of their best albums "The Sum of No Evil" It is a well recorded DVD and has some of their best material. The only problem I encountered was that my copy was a region zero and would not play on my Sony DVD player. However, after I purchased a more advanced Yamaha bluray player the concert played in fine form and would be fun for any fan of the Flower kings.
THIS DVD DID NOT PLAY ON ANY OF MY BLUE RAY OR DVD PLAYERS. UNDER PRODUCT DESCRIPTION, IT INDICATES IT WILL PLAY IN ALL REGIONS. CONCIDER THIS A WARNING.
